::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer nods, tapping a few buttons on a working machine and 
sliding a chair up.

"This should help ya. There are devices in those drawers," he points 
to the drawers, "And this machine'll help ya make the glasses."

He steps back to let her sit down. "So, you made glasses like this 
before?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...>
